needs: Seyi seeks to deliver measurable investment outcomes by clarifying goals, constraints, and key signals early. They focus on sourcing deals with strong hit rates and building thorough TAM analyses to inform substantial investments. Their current context demands balancing simplicity, accountability, and iterative progress while operating part-time and managing budgets with strong governance and auditability.
personality: Seyi is pragmatic and collaborative, favoring clear communication and facilitative teamwork. They emphasize ownership, craft, and speed, using lightweight documentation and data-driven iteration. They surface unknowns early through small experiments and prototypes, prefer humane, transparent processes, and prioritize simplicity and accountability over complexity or debate.
